meanings.definition: The state or quality of being cornetcy.
meanings.sent1: The cornetcies of the town were evident in the colorful banners and flags.
meanings.sent2: She admired the cornetcies of the painting, noting the intricate details.
meanings.sent3: The cornetcies of the cake were so perfect that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work showed in the cornetcies of his craftsmanship.
meanings.sent5: The cornetcies of the garden were a testament to her love for flowers.

meanings.definition: The office or rank of a cornet.
meanings.sent1: He was proud to hold the cornetcies in the military band.
meanings.sent2: The cornetcies required him to practice diligently to perfect his skills.
meanings.sent3: In the land of toys, the cornetcies was the highest position one could achieve.
meanings.sent4: She aspired to reach the cornetcies in her music class one day.
meanings.sent5: The cornetcies in the orchestra commanded respect from all musicians.

meanings.definition: The territory or jurisdiction of a cornet.
meanings.sent1: The cornetcies of the small village extended to the nearby fields.
meanings.sent2: As the cornet explored the cornetcies, he discovered hidden gems in the land.
meanings.sent3: The cornetcies of the playground were ruled by the children's imagination.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a queen within the cornetcies of her own backyard.
meanings.sent5: The cornetcies of the forest were filled with mystery and wonder.
